meanings.definition: A board in a computer or other electronic device that holds connectors and allows for the connection of other boards or devices.
meanings.sent1: The backplane in the computer helped connect the printer and scanner.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to securely attach all components to the backplane of the device.
meanings.sent3: The backplane decided to throw a party for all the connectors.
meanings.sent4: The backplane of the system acted as a bridge between different devices.
meanings.sent5: The backplane resembled a busy city intersection, with data flowing like traffic.
